TransactionId.description:
Unique identification of the transaction.
Special character: -
Example format of a typical TransactionId: CE25B426-9430-4A82-8EB8-9311DA2D3E12

Timestamp.description: Date and time of the interest payment. Time in UTC.

Reference.description: Transaction reference of the interest payment.

DestinationAccountId.description:
Destination account ID for the interest payment.
Special Character: -
Example format of a typical DestinationAccountId: CE25B426-9430-4A82-8EB8-9311DA2D3E12
